website_summaries.verdict: It produces decent light and is easy to install, but problems with the pull string may deter some potential buyers.
pros: An attractive light that's easy to install
lights up a room with no flickering or blue hue noted
cons: There have been owner complaints about the pull chain coming loose or malfunctioning

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Really bright. 8 of them light my 30 x 40 shop.
customer_reviews.author: russell schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I can see everything
customer_reviews.text: Great Product and Great Seller. Lit up my garage so well... Couldn't complain. Just look at the photos of before and after. Nice and bright but not blue tint in color like most LEDs First Photo was done at 7pm so the sun was almost set The second was at 7:30pm the following day and the sun was completely set
customer_reviews.author: Christian Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shop light
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at these for a while sure they have $12 florescent, usually I buy a florescent and it works great until the first bulb burns out. put a new bulb in and it doesn't work? So I bit the bullet and bought a LED shop light and you can bet I'm buying some more. These things are not only brighter but, a white light and I'll probably never have to change the bulbs! I had two florescent lights at the end of the driveway they burned out every week? and they only come on at night, so I replaced them with LED's if you are like me and hate changing bulbs switch to led!
customer_reviews.author: Mastercard

customer_reviews.title: Great work light for the money
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesomely bright compared to the same size fluorescent shop light it replaced. It uses only 40 watts which is half the power consumption and if it lasts the thousands of hours it's supposed to, should pay for itself in a few years by energy savings and not having to replace 4 foot bulbs. The LED's are also apparently sturdy because it arrived in the original manufacturer's cardboard box with no padding or packaging material.
customer_reviews.author: Nyeti

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these to use above my wood working shop bench. Nice bright light. Hung them to about 7 feet above the bench as I have found the LEDs diffuse light such that any higher and the brightness decreases too much to be used for close work. Color is "daylight" range but not a blue or green cast. Lightweight and easy to install. Would like to have a longer cord for plug in. Before I installed these had three fluorescent lights that did not work well in the cold. LEDs light come on bright right away. Had them only a few weeks. Hope they last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Divena

customer_reviews.title: these are good quality units with pull chain on-off switches and good ...
customer_reviews.text: I found these later, after I had ordered them & they were already shipped, at Bi-Mart for $9 less each and no shipping. Since I needed even more I went & bought 4 more at Bi-Mart. As far as the lights are concerned, these are good quality units with pull chain on-off switches and good quality 5 foot long cords. They also come with a couple of pieces of light gage chain & hooks for hanging them. They do not weigh much because they do not have ballasts and are rated at 50,000 hours of use. They are also rated to -20 degrees so unlike fluorescent lights these come on instantly and are very bright.
customer_reviews.author: DJUDSTER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lights!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing. I will never have Fluorescent lights in my garage again. I have two now and plan to add two more for a completely lit garage that is sure to light up every angle for cleaning and working on my vehicles. Only thing I would recommend is a little longer pull cord. It's fine but I am 6ft tall and hanging from the garage ceiling I have to reach up to grab them, not a big deal for me, but if you have a taller ceiling or are shorter this will be an issue. I suppose you can add a little rope to the pull, but that does not look as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tharp

customer_reviews.title: VERY bright, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We purchase two of these lights for our garage because we could not see into our freezer without taking a flashlight with us each time we opened it. These lights are very bright. easy to install, it remains to be seen if the cost is small for operation. we have not had them but a month so far. The LED lights should last a good long time. I am tired of replacing the long tubes in my old lights. These do a great job, cheaper to operate and last much long than the old tube type. We are very happy with these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Bright but poor side lighting/diffusion
customer_reviews.text: This light is about 50% brighter than my florescent fixture but it is a harsh light does not diffuse nicely. It also shines straight down with very little side lighting, unlike florescent lights. The center of this fixture is totally hollow (no wires) so you can drill/screw straight into it for flush mounting without fear of hitting any electronics. The wiring runs behind the strips of LEDs right below the ribbed heat sinks.
customer_reviews.author: TheOldDude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LED shop light
customer_reviews.text: This light is replacing a 30 year old twin tube fluorescent shop light. The ballast went, which costs almost as much as a new light, and I thought I would give a new LED one a shot. Due to the lack of a ballast, the height of the light is half of a traditional fluorescent. Man, does this thing put light out! It practically lights up my whole shop! The only downside is now I have to replace the other 3 lights with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Schnittman

customer_reviews.title: Great product passed the test
customer_reviews.text: Great product, quick startup. I replaced the lighting in half of my garage first to do a side by side comparision to the existing 4 foot T8 fixtures. These outperform the fluorescents of the same length by a factor of two at significant energy savings. My issues with cold starts when the temperature gets low have been eliminated as well.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty bright light
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty bright light. I would have given it 5 stars except that it arrived slightly damaged. It still works but there was no additional packaging other than the package it would come in if you bought it at a local store. The item arrived with the package not sealed and the plastic on one of the ends is cracked. I was still able to mount it and it appears to still be fairly stable, but not sure for how long since the crack was close to where the chain connects to the light. Only other complaint would be that the chain to turn it on is a bit short and does not have an extension.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Swart

customer_reviews.title: The light itself seems to work. However, it ...
customer_reviews.text: The light itself seems to work. However, it did not come with the hardware to mount it. The instructions that came with it specifically said it came with 2 chains, 4 "S" hooks, 2 eye hooks, 2 anchors, and 2 cable ties. The mounting hardware was not there. Also there were several scratches and scuff marks on the unit itself. This leads me to believe it was returned by someone else. I was led to believe this was a brand new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Light of America LED Utility Shoplight 40 Watt
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived well protected and in excellent condition! This product lights up half of my basement in bright white which makes visibility in my work shop very good. The brightest shoplight I have ever owned! Hooked to a switch to decrease wear and tear on the built in on-off switch. Would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: Super amount of light without being blinding like most led's, I punish myself every time I think about how long I put up with flourescents. High quality extruded aluminum body. It took maybe 5 minutes to install these ( I ordered 4 for a 26x30 foot metal building). Don't know about longevity yet but will give them the benefit of the doubt for now.
customer_reviews.author: Berlin A. Heck

customer_reviews.title: After installing this strip light, I was amazed how much light it give out. Vegas baby!
customer_reviews.text: This light is amazing...I bought it to use in my basement, I needed more light than I was getting from a led light bulb. Boy, after installing this strip light I was amazed how much light it give out. Excellent value, I think I'll buy another! Highly recommended. I shopped around and this was the best deal out there...Fast shipping and well packed, a breeze for me to install.
customer_reviews.author: Scottish

customer_reviews.title: Read the Warranty Fine Print
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set about 24 months ago and both worked great up until one of the units stopped working this week. I was disappointed to learn that the 5 year limited warranty is only valid if the customer prepays shipping costs...which unfortunately equals the cost of buying a new set. Lighting is great, just wish quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Strom

customer_reviews.title: First LED worklight - they won't be my last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light because they were LED's. I have 3 flouresents in my garage and I have had to replace all 3 ballasts in less than 3 years after installation. I installed this light and I liked that the cord was 3 or 4 feet long so I could easily plug it into my ceiling outlet. Anyway, they are bright without being too harsh of a color. And the best part is I don't have to replace a ballast.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Novak

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging, design. Just go to Costco
customer_reviews.text: After waiting a couple weeks, the lights arrived damaged but didn't matter since they're being installed in a garage. Each of the 4 aluminum shades were bent and paint cracked around the edges. Also when linked in a chain, they do not all turn on/off with the pull of the lead chain. Costco has better LED shop lights for less money that actually work as you'd expect. On the bright side... the lights provide excellent light.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it, has the switch in line on the cord, not a pull chain. Has a plug in style cord. Puts out lots of light and is instant on and does not flicker or hum.
customer_reviews.author: keyman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged (but operable) due to inadequate packaging for single item shipment. Metal housing bent at one corner with pieces of plastic end cap broken off. Obviously the item was dropped on one corner of the box. Additional mounting hardware is needed to hang light as shown on site. More chain and hooks needed. Supplied hardware will allow a single chain only on both ends. The light itself is 5 star - light weight, easy to install and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: P. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...
customer_reviews.text: ...it is, of course, easy to install and the light output is outstanding. I unanimously recommend this shop light which I, by the way, use for photography.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy - Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, crisp light. Bought two for my solar powered workshop building. LED frame is aluminum, with plastic caps on the ends. One of the caps came with a cracked piece. No big deal. Light comes with S-hooks, ceiling hooks, and chains for each end. It has a pull chain, but I cut off the electrical plug and wired directly to a 110V circuit. Easy. Will buy a 3rd one soon. There is a slight hum or buzz sound; not enough to be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little beat up
customer_reviews.text: Nice light for my workbench. Very bright and hopefully will last a long time. I would have given it 5 stars but it came a little beat up. This is the second time I've ordered something recently that did not arrive in a shipping box. It wast just the item in its original box with the shipping sticker attached to it. Normally amazon ships a box in a box.
customer_reviews.author: smileyburg

customer_reviews.title: If you like strobe-lights this is for you
customer_reviews.text: i bought this in June and then broke my arm. Just put up today, turned it on and it works like a strobe light. Non-stop flashing. This is one piece so there doesn’t seem to be anything I can do to repair it. I can’t return it to Amazon because it’s too late and I can find who is responsible. Literally a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great brightness and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to hang by my garage door to add additional light to my garage. I would not recommend these except for hanging applications. The shroud is a bit large and so the angle of light it gives off is not great if you are replacing ceiling mounted lights on a lower ceiling, but if you have a nice open space and they are mounted high, they work very well and are very bright!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: No point in buying old fluorescent lights anymore when there's this
customer_reviews.text: This is basically just like a classic fluorescent light fixture, only better in every way due to being LED. Super-bright, good quality, turns on almost instantly, completely silent. Although it is more expensive than a fluorescent fixture, it is just so much better that at this point I would never recommend buying the old type anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eoban Binder

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this shop light. It's light, puts out amazing light. I liked it so much that I put 4 into my garage. Now when I turn on the light, it's like noon-time daylight. I would highly recommend this particular light if you are interested in making the switch to LED.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: it presents equal and brilliant lighting. I'd recommend this for any lighting
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this above my pool table, it presents equal and brilliant lighting. I'd recommend this for any lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Praemus

customer_reviews.title: I have outfitted my whole shop with these and have been more than happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Get rid of those awful fluorescent tube lights in your shop. These LED shop lights are well constructed aluminum extrusion. The LEDs turn on even when it is cold, and are far brighter than tubes. I have outfitted my whole shop with these and have been more than happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: NVM

customer_reviews.title: Works well but was cracked on delivery
customer_reviews.text: This light works very well. Bright and easy the hang up, however the packaging looked like it was drop kicked (see pictures) when it was delivered. After opening the package i found the fixture was cracked. Plugged it in, worked, so i hung it up anyways because it's probably not worth the hassle it'd be arguing with customer service and shipping it back to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing was that the package on arrival made a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the light. I replaced an old 8 ft. 2 lamp florescent and have more light and no heat from it. The only bad thing was that the package on arrival made a chink/clank sound as I inspected the box. I almost sent it back as it sounded like something was broken. The noises were caused by loose hardware bags inside. The manufacturer should have taped those things to the inside. Now on to the second 8 ft. light replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Roberts

customer_reviews.title: does not look like it's new!
customer_reviews.text: product works great but it came with scratches and missing hardware, sad thing is that, this is the second one i purchased.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Best light I have found.
customer_reviews.text: These lights arrived packaged very well. It took a couple of minutes to attach the hardware and install them. When I turned them on I was very impressed with the brightness and the area illuminated. I will definitely be getting more for my work shop in the barn and replace the old lights. Just a note of caution do not look up at them when they are on !!!! They are bright !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'll never go back to the old school style ballasts now that I've seen the LED ballast at work. As you can tell, my garage corner work area needed some lighting help. I purchased a light bulb socket adapter and the LED shop light was plug and play right into the ceiling. Only thing I could pick at is it has about a 1.5 second delay from light switch actuation to illumination. But no warmup necessary. Immediate bright LED illumination. Well worth $50. Don't waste your time on more expensive models. Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: C and M

customer_reviews.title: super bright, no shadows and better than anything that ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this light exactly above a bench at about 6+ feet from the ground and the light over the bench is incredible, very uniform, wide coverage, super bright, no shadows and better than anything that that I have tried over the years. Just perfect for precision work.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hazi

customer_reviews.title: Bright Lights
customer_reviews.text: These replacement lights are bright, white, so color is true and very easily installed. The included chains for hanging from the ceiling are adjustable. The lights have separate pull switches for on/off so that you can individualize your lighting pattern. They made an immense improvement in my basement workshop. The price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: LV2SKI

customer_reviews.title: great value until the price went up
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these and love them, but when I looked to buy a couple more I noticed they were almost 40% more expensive. Perhaps not worth the price at $56
customer_reviews.author: cpseattle

customer_reviews.title: What a light.
customer_reviews.text: - Super bright white. - Nearly instant on (less than a second) - No heat. - Good looking. - Easy mounting. - Light-weight. I couldn't find anything comparable for the price. If I wasn't broke, I'd replace every shoplight I have in my garage with this.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Pedreros

customer_reviews.title: Use it in my garage workshop and am extremely happy. I have had the first one for 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second light and I have had it for at 6 months. Use it in my garage workshop and am extremely happy. I have had the first one for 18 months plus with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: J. Landrum

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husbands for his garage. I got him 2. They are amazing and soooo bright. He loves them. It lights up the entire 2 car garage so well. We paired then with a remote control surge protector and it is just like they are meant to be there and were wired in. I highly recommend these lights!
customer_reviews.author: Heather and Denton Burson

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: lit up my whole garage with just one . Easily out does the 2 old fluorescent ones on the other side . Will eventually buy 3 more 2 to replace the fluorescents and 1 for closer to the garage door . Under the blue car are the old style ones the first photo is the led second is all on from led side looking at old style and 3rd photo is only the led on .
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: ... to light hay loft in horse barn and works wonderfully. Extremely bright with low power requirement which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Used to light hay loft in horse barn and works wonderfully. Extremely bright with low power requirement which is important as we have limited power supply in the barn. Buying more to put in chicken coop and garage.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wotton

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Easy installation. It was shipped in it's retail packaging which was punctured during transit, but the light was not damaged. Update: After a couple of weeks the on/off switch broke. Now I have to use a power strip to turn it off and on. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the price quality cable pull switch feels strong very high quality I'm Blown Away. Edit: Bought a second one, really great light even in the cold garage, instant on. GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This utility light is really bright. I positioned it ...
customer_reviews.text: This utility light is really bright. I positioned it over my work bench and now I can see what I'm doing. It turns on instantly and doesn't buzz or flicker. I hope it works this well for years.
customer_reviews.author: Alfwallscaler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LED light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light. Its brighter than the CFL bulb shop light I'm using. I'm thinking of buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Average

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright white light
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright white light. My garage had two incandescent bulbs that did ok for general lighting but I wanted more light in my work bench area. One of these lights was perfect. I might get a second one for the other side of the garage or center the one I got as it's probably bright enough to work for the whole garage
customer_reviews.author: sharky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shop lights
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shop lights! WAY brighter than the usual lights and easy to install. I assume it uses less power as well which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly bright for a 40 W light.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly bright for a 40 W light. Came with all required material for installation. Installed it above a 6 foot workbench in the garage for which it provides more than adequate lighting. Pull chain for switch could be a little longer and more robust.
customer_reviews.author: oli67

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if 8 of these would light up my 30 X 40 shop but they did very well. I will buy two more to put directly over my bench area. I love these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B.

customer_reviews.title: LED shop light
customer_reviews.text: The light works great and lights up the area better than the flourescent light it replaced. Also starts up in the cold when the other light wouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: pakroger

customer_reviews.title: A really good light.
customer_reviews.text: This light does exactly what I expected and wanted. It puts out a lot of light at the color temperature that is pleasing to me. Also, they are easy to install. The lights have no capability to be connected together, but that is allright with me. These are really good lights -- I recommend them for shop and garage use.
customer_reviews.author: Stan M.

customer_reviews.title: Super shop light!
customer_reviews.text: Good color (4500K) daylight, very bright, well made and easy to install. came with plug in wiring and a pull chain for easy on/off Cons: None would I buy again? Yes
customer_reviews.author: J Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of this lights. They are good and perfect lighting for a large garage. But quality is bad, 2 of then burned out in the first week, now another one is out after 3 months. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: vittoffo

customer_reviews.title: like looking into the sun
customer_reviews.text: First it is VERY BRIGHT, almost to bright if you putting it only 4 feet over a work bench. I have to wear a baseball hat to top the glare, like looking into the sun. Great Light , but needs a defuser .
customer_reviews.author: Martha A. Hurd Call

customer_reviews.title: Great shop light
customer_reviews.text: We put this up in the shop, and it immediately became my favorite light. None of the messing around you get with standard tube shop lights - no flicking on and off to make it 'catch,' no fiddling with the bulbs, no flickering, just nice bright steady light that illuminates half the garage. Awesome. Very light, very easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Looney

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.....
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect... other than a .5 second delay when turning on, this is a perfect replacement for older T8 shop lights. Bright as heck! I bought a second one after be so impressed with the first.
customer_reviews.author: ATDM

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to brighten up my garage I run my business out of. They are nice and bright they were very easy to install. They were shipped in the original packaging and possibly lost a instalation hook in transit. The product is great however.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Richter

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 10 of these. One was dead on arrival ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 10 of these. One was dead on arrival. I obtained a refund for that one, left me with 9 . 7 months later, I have only 4 that will light. They were used very little, probably a total of 30 hrs. Definitely not worth the price. Yes, they are all on same circuit.
customer_reviews.author: JustDon

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packing for shipment
customer_reviews.text: All in all the light is good.. However, it did arrive with damage to one of the end caps and one LED was bad.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Fry

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Lights up half the garage that is my workshop. Very much fit the the bill. The light is quite white which doesn't work in many applications but perfect spectrum to light up woodworking and measuring cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beware same model number does not mean same lights....
customer_reviews.text: Was not overly happy when I got the light with major damage to light shield. I had purchased a set of two lights in the past and they were fine. I made sure to purchase the exact model number so they would all match and be uniform. Note position of tube lights back light original new in front... different spacing? Most disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hebson

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: I have these in my sewing room for our upholstery business. It's like turning on the sun!
customer_reviews.author: RedheadNV

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these lights! Received undamaged but still could have been packed better.Nice bright white light turns right on.No more flickering humming flouresents.
customer_reviews.author: william chasan jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super Bright, energy efficient, long lasting and doesn't get hot.
customer_reviews.author: MA_DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of this LED light. My first was from Rockler and I wanted another. But the price doubled. So I tried Amazon and bought it for less than the first. Great product. Bright white light and simple install. I may need some more 😀
customer_reviews.author: JCCountersteer

customer_reviews.title: Good shop light
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and well made. I'd give it 5 stars if the light spectrum was a bit more warm , maybe 3000 deg. K
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: In the middle of the night, it's daytime in my garage now!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these lights. I hung three of them in my garage and now I can work on projects all through the night. These light my garage up as bright as day.
customer_reviews.author: ClearBlueDigital

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just received this unit (bought on a whim with gift certificate). Opened it up. Felt solid and not cheaply made. Plugged it in and WOW. SUPER bright. 2 rows of 120 LEDs. All lit up instantly. No flicker. Will definetely be buying more. Excellent light for the money
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This light is great. One interesting thing is that the individual LED ...
customer_reviews.text: This light is great. One interesting thing is that the individual LED lamps glow slightly when off, so it is easy to find the pull chain even in the pitch dark. I mounted it under a low inclined ceiling within easy reach. The color is quite blue, but very bright for working under.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Allred

customer_reviews.title: ... to my garage workshop and they are bright and beautiful. Dinged it one star due to one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Added two of these to my garage workshop and they are bright and beautiful. Dinged it one star due to one of the ends being cracked. The light still works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D

customer_reviews.title: I bought one of these and liked it so well I bought another
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and liked it so well I bought another. It's quite a bit brighter than my T8 fluorescent lights.
customer_reviews.author: The buyer of the clothes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light weight, didn't even need anchors in the popcorn ceiling. Good quality, sturdy, and comes with all hardware. Very bright, 4 of them completely light up every corner of a 3 car garage. I will buy a few more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: I switched from florescent fixtures to LED to eliminate issues ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched from fluorescent fixtures to LED to eliminate issues with cold weather flickering. Unfortunately even these LED fixtures can't handle 30 degrees F. So far I have two fixtures out of four that flicker on and off constantly in the cold. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: S. bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Great LED fixture
customer_reviews.text: This light has been a fantastic upgrade to my garage. It adds tons of lighting and was super easy to install. Will be buying another for my shed
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much I purchased 4 more and am ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally got one of these to replace a similarly-sized fluorescent light fixture in my garage because the ballast had failed. These are much brighter and should last a lot longer. I like it so much I purchased 4 more and am am putting them in a workshop I am building. Great light. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David DeBorger

customer_reviews.title: and doesn't flicker or buzz like flourescents. Lights up my 15'x15' workshop just fine
customer_reviews.text: Bright as heck, and doesn't flicker or buzz like flourescents. Lights up my 15'x15' workshop just fine. Fairly easy to install. Only drawback is the cord which requires an outlet, would be nice to have a hardwire option. Also, 3 of the LED's just quit, but there's plenty left to light up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Herling

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, very well made with LED strips on an aluminum extrusion heatsink and provided chain to mount it with. High quality cord and grounded plug. This is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Ok cost great light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, bright good coverage. A competitor has a different brand cheaper that I bought for a second one and it seems just as good. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Put these up in the garage, really easy to fit I cut off the plus and hard wired them. Instant startup white bright light. Brighter than by dual 80w fixtures especially in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Andynj

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not very good quality---ordered 2---1 was delivered broken plastic in box----the light goes straight down....no spread at all...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Royer

customer_reviews.title: Actually 4500 lumens - very bright
customer_reviews.text: It's a terrific shoplight and I installed three of them to replace dying fluorescent fixtures. These lights are brighter and I look forward to never having to buy another 4' fluorescent bulb. One correction as far as lumen output - on the box I received it says 4500 lumens as opposed to the 4200 lumens in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Wow bright light. Bought 6 and may get a few more for other places. The 6 are in garage and it's like day light when you turn the lights on. You will not be sorry buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan k Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Out with the old Fluorescent light, in with the new LED light.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a second light in our Garage to cover the south end since it was a bit too dark. After installing this fantastic bright LED light we've decided to replace our old Fluorescent light with the same fixture. So long outdated Fluorescent light.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: A lot to like
customer_reviews.text: Man, these things are bright, significantly brighter than the fluorescent 2-bulb fixtures they're replacing. Pros - brightness level less energy used lightweight, easy to install unbreakable (previously had a few close calls with bulbs in my shop) made (assembled) in USA Cons - can't think of any
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these one was delivered with the pull cord ripped out already. It was a simple fix but I still had to go buy a new switch and install it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Frye

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have been in daily use now for 4 months . Come on instantly at 40 degrees , nice and bright .
customer_reviews.author: motahead

customer_reviews.title: They work great. There was an initial pause at start-up that ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got them all up. They work great. There was an initial pause at start-up that had me worried, but no other problems. Good light distribution & color for the Garage/Shop. This seller has the Best price on these, will be back for more as needed :-)
customer_reviews.author: AGC

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective way to add some lumens.
customer_reviews.text: They're fine...sort of got the impression that a flush mount option existed, but no...suspended and not hard wired...unless you want to splice your own connections.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brett Howell

customer_reviews.title: Pull chain stopped working right away.
customer_reviews.text: Light's bright, but the on-off chain worked for only three clicks. On. Then Off. Then On. No more Off. I guess that's better than No More On, eh? I don't want to box it up and send it back, though. I suppose we'll mickey-mouse a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Currie

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these Dec 2016 and one has already gone bad with very little use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P.

customer_reviews.title: great led shoplight
customer_reviews.text: great light, does not weigh much, hangs easily and has a really nice bright light. Only thing I had to do was add an extension metal pull cord. The original was too short.
customer_reviews.author: FJV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice, bright and I have had this for a while now, I really like how its made
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Light Output!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount, excellent bright light. I put 2 in the garage and one in the basement (will probably get a second for the basement) and they make a world of difference! Brighter than similar sized fluorescent lights.
customer_reviews.author: BP from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Lights.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to install and very bright. I am buying two more for my garage so I can find things I have not seen in years.
customer_reviews.author: L. W. Alaskan

customer_reviews.title: Super bright, white LEDs for garage
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Bought 3 of them for my very large garage.
customer_reviews.author: John Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Crushed Boxes and Broken Product on Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Had to disassemble pull chain switch to fish out broken chain and connect it to new chain that I bought to replace broken chain. I like the light but did not like having to fix a new one right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Wavel Justice

customer_reviews.title: Brighten your day or night.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright easy to install. One package came with hooks and chain, the other had chain and no hooks. This was no issue just wanted to mention, box was a little crunched but light was fine. Plug into socket and pull chain. Ta,da....let there be light.
customer_reviews.author: Steamer

customer_reviews.title: and the brightness was perfect. I now have two of these 4200 lumen ...
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this into my work shop, and the brightness was perfect. I now have two of these 4200 lumen light fixtures, and I can now see all my work much more clearly. I would definitely recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: John B

product_meta.title: Light of America LED Utility Shoplight 40 watt 4500 Lumen 48" (4 feet) with pull On/Off. One piece Aluminum housing. Hanging hardware (chain) included.
product_meta.description: This HIGH POWER LED Shop Light includes 120 bright white LEDs and is suitable for indoor use. Ideal for residential and commercial use to provide lighting for garages and work spaces. Uses only 40 Watts Benefits: -Pull Chain Operation -Eco-Friendly -No Radiated Heat -Long Life -Energy Saving -Reflective Housin -Quick and Easy Installation within 20 minutes -No Bulb Replacement Needed -Includes hanging chain, hardware, and 5 foot 3 prong cord (grounded) -Mercury Free -Full Brightness (Instant) Specifications: Watts Used: 40 Incandescent Equiv.: N/A Size: 46.5" x 6" x 2.75" Color Temp: 5,000K Output: 4200 Lumens CRI: 86 Efficacy/Lumens Per Watt: 105 Rated Life: 50,000 Hours Warranty: 5 Year Limited
feature_bullets: Instant full brightness. No humming. Convenient 5 foot long plug-in cord. Can hang or attach directly to the ceiling or underside of a cabinet. 4 feet long, energy used 40 watts, 4200 lumens output, life approximately 50,000 hours.
Lasts 45 years when used 3 hours a day, 365 days a year. Save energy costs. Perfect for garages, basements, game rooms, utility rooms, work shops, cabinets, closets, attics, and more
No mercury, No humming, Instant full brightness. Electronic driver.
Sturdy one piece Aluminum housing. White reflective interior. Hanging chain and hardware included. 5 foot long 3 prong grounded cord.
